features.name: 64-bit large objects
features.description: Large objects are now 64-bit and can now be up to 4TB where before it …

features.name: Custom background workers
features.description: Background worker processes can now be added that can attach to PostgreSQL's shared memory.

features.name: Disk based FSM
features.description: replaces the shared memory fixed size free space map with an on-disk implemenation

features.name: Dynamic Background Workers
features.description: Allows background workers to be started and stopped dynamically by any user process.

features.name: EXPLAIN (BUFFERS) support
features.description: adds the ability to show buffer-usage statistics for a query

features.name: EXPLAIN (MEMORY)
features.description: The `EXPLAIN` option `MEMORY` reports optimizer memory usage .

features.name: EXPLAIN (SERIALIZE) support
features.description: The `EXPLAIN` option `SERIALIZE` reports the cost of converting data for network transmission.

features.name: EXPLAIN (WAL) support
features.description: [EXPLAIN](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/sql-explain.html) can now track WAL usage information along with [auto_explain](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/auto-explain.html), [autovacuum](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/routine-vacuuming.html#AUTOVACUUM), and [pg_stat_statements](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/13/pgstatstatements.html). For more …

features.name: "jsonlog" logging format
features.description: PostgreSQL logs can now be output in [JSON](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/15/runtime-config-logging.html#RUNTIME-CONFIG-LOGGING-JSONLOG) using the [`jsonlog`](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/15/runtime-config-logging.html#RUNTIME-CONFIG-LOGGING-JSONLOG) parameter when setting [`log_destination`](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/15/runtime-config-logging.html#RUNTIME-CONFIG-LOGGING-WHERE). …

features.name: Loadable plugin infrastructure for monitoring the planner
features.description: allows plugins to augment or even replace the planner (like for providing an index advisor)

features.name: Payload support for LISTEN/NOTIFY
features.description: [`NOTIFY`](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/sql-notify.html) can send payload data, which can be received by [`LISTEN`](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/sql-listen.html)

features.name: Server statistics in shared memory
features.description: [Server-level statistics](https://www.postgresql.org/docs/current/monitoring-stats.html) are stored in shared memory. This eliminates the separate statistics collector process.

features.description: Previously sizing shared memory often required adjusting kernel parameters to accommodate the change. This is …

features.name: XML, JSON and YAML output for EXPLAIN
features.description: Adds XML, JSON and YAML output to EXPLAIN to help with automatic processing of plans

features.name: Arrays of compound types
features.description: allows the creation of arrays of arbitrary complex compound types

features.name: NULLs in Array
features.description: array elements can contain NULL

features.name: Phrase search
features.description: Fulltext search for phrases and word proximity.

features.description: A serial data type that uses smallint (2 byte integer) as its base type, giving …

features.name: Type modifier support
features.description: allows user defined datatypes to specify a type modifier

features.name: Concurrent GiST indexes
features.description: Advanced locking for concurrent modification of GiST indexes

features.description: Allows additional columns to be included in as "non-key" columns in an index, and if …

features.description: Allows additional columns to be included in as "non-key" columns in a GiST index, and …

features.name: Deferrable unique constraints
features.description: allows unique constraint checking to be deferred until the end of the transaction

features.name: Exclusion constraints
features.description: generalizes the concept of uniqueness to support any indexable commutative operator, not just equality

features.name: GIN Index performance and size improvements
features.description: GIN Indexes now take up significantly less space and perform a lot faster than pre-9.4 …

features.description: Also known as "covering indexes", allows data in indexes to satisfy queries where all columns …

features.description: GiST indexes now support index-only scans.

features.name: In-memory Bitmap Indexes
features.description: enabled the planner to combine multiple indexes using an in-memory bitmap

features.description: Add support for K-nearest neighbor (K-NN) searches on SP-GiST indexes when the distance operator `<->` …

features.name: Non-blocking CREATE INDEX
features.description: online index creation without locking the table

features.name: Parallel B-tree index scans
features.description: B-tree index pages can be searched by separate parallel workers.

features.name: Parallelized CREATE INDEX for BRIN indexes
Parallelized CREATE INDEX for B-tree indexes

features.name: GROUPING SETS, CUBE and ROLLUP support

features.name: Non-decimal integer literals

features.description: These prevent non-key-field row updates from locking foreign key rows.

features.description: SQL standard shorthand version for `SELECT * FROM` For more information, please see the documentation …

features.description: This allows a primary key or unique constraint to be defined using an existing unique …

features.description: Extend statistics can help the query planner provided better plans for queries that have "OR".clauses …

features.description: allows hashing to be used across compatible but not identical datatypes

features.description: allows hashing to be used in query plans involving DISTINCT/UNION/EXCEPT/INTERSECT

features.description: Allows a variable number of function parameters
